snippet.title: HexLands Official Teaser - Roguelike City Builder
snippet.description:
Here's the teaser of my game, HexLands! A turn-based, city builder, strategy game with roguelike, roguelite elements, set on peaceful, procedural medieval islands, ready to be settled!
Wishlist on Steam now! ➤ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2244650/HexLands/?utm_source=yt&utm_content=teaser
Join our Discord community ➤ https://discord.gg/6hKwSaCkwa
Support me on Patreon for special benefits ➤ https://www.patreon.com/tudvari
Subscribe to my mailing list for giveaways, betas and news ➤ https://mailchi.mp/659931c62f88/portgatestudios
https://twitter.com/TudvariOfficial
https://www.facebook.com/PortgateStudios

#gamedev #indiegame #indiegames
